effects.effect: Choose one of the following abilities.

features.name: Jam Session
features.flavor: Your jam session creates new genres that compel everyone to get up and move.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
Each creature within distance gains a +5 bonus to speed until the end of their next turn. While under this effect, each target must use their full movement during their turn.
###### Melt Their Faces (11 Drama)
*The power of music rips through the reality around the target and blows them away.*
| **Magic, Melee, Ranged, Strike** |               **Main action** |
| -------------------------------- | ----------------------------: |
| **üìè Melee 1 or ranged 10**      | **üéØ One creature or object** |

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Forced movement from this ability ignores stability.
